Uses of Class
popt4jlib.LIP.AdditiveSolver2.Node

  • Packages that use AdditiveSolver2.Node 
    Package Description
    popt4jlib.LIP
    package contains parallel implementations of some well-known algorithms for Linear Integer Programming, including Balas' Additive Algorithm (dating back to an Operations Research article of 1965).

    • Uses of AdditiveSolver2.Node in popt4jlib.LIP

      Fields in popt4jlib.LIP declared as AdditiveSolver2.Node 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static AdditiveSolver2.Node AdditiveSolver2._optimal 
      private AdditiveSolver2.Node AdditiveSolver2.ON._v 
      Methods in popt4jlib.LIP that return AdditiveSolver2.Node 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private static AdditiveSolver2.Node AdditiveSolver2.selectNode()
      return the first element in the list pointed to by _head.
      Methods in popt4jlib.LIP with parameters of type AdditiveSolver2.Node 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private void AdditiveSolver2.branch(int col, AdditiveSolver2.Node current)
      creates two new Node objects (with different values for the x_col variable), and puts them in the shared list pointed by _head.
      private void AdditiveSolver2.close(AdditiveSolver2.Node current)
      sets the status of the Node argument to false (closed).
      private int AdditiveSolver2.computeNode(AdditiveSolver2.Node current, IntArray1SparseVector bbar)
      processes the argument Node, possibly modifying the 2nd argument as well.
      private void AdditiveSolver2.fixSumTestVars(AdditiveSolver2.Node current)
      performs the Additive Algorithm's fix-sum-test to set all variables that can be set to 0 or 1 at their values, and checks for completeness of result.
      private void AdditiveSolver2.imposeConstraint(AdditiveSolver2.Node current)
      modifies this solver's vector's _b last (augmented) component, as well the matrix's _A last (augmented) row, if the condition _zbar < _csum holds.
      private int AdditiveSolver2.infSum(AdditiveSolver2.Node current)
      return the free variable index j (column) that minimizes the quantity \sum_i{(_bbar[i]-_A[i][j])_{+}} (the sum includes the last -augmented- row of _A and component of _b).
      private void AdditiveSolver2.LU(AdditiveSolver2.Node current)
      upper- and lower-bounds the argument Node object.
      private static void AdditiveSolver2.putInOrder(AdditiveSolver2.Node nd)
      puts the Node nd inside the list pointed to by _head, in order so that the Nodes' _v._z value is in ascending order (smallest value first).
      private static void AdditiveSolver2.remove(AdditiveSolver2.Node nd)
      removes Node nd from the list pointed to by _head.
      protected int AdditiveSolver2.selectVariable(AdditiveSolver2.Node current)
      protected method used to select a free variable given an open node.
      protected int AdditiveSolver3.selectVariable(AdditiveSolver2.Node current) 
      private boolean AdditiveSolver2.sumTest(AdditiveSolver2.Node current)
      performs the sum-test check of the Additive Algorithm.
      private static void AdditiveSolver2.updateZ(AdditiveSolver2.Node current)
      updates the argument's _z value, as well as _zstar,_zbar,_optimal members if appropriate.
